New Records: Mitchell Marsh scored the fastest double century in ODIs
Key Match Events: Mitchell Marsh scored an unbeaten 177 off 132 balls
Australia won by 8 wickets with 32 balls remaining
Post-Match Reflections: Pat Cummins expressed satisfaction with the win and confidence in the team's form
Najmul Hossain Shanto acknowledged the need for improvement, particularly in the middle overs
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bangladesh's only solace is that they avoided damage to net run-rate and will likely qualify for Champions Trophy
Australia maintained their unbeaten World Cup record against Bangladesh
